cards.name: Cao Cao, Lord of Wei
cards.text: {T}: Target opponent discards two cards. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

cards.flavor: Her leadership forged the Weatherlight's finest crew.
cards.name: Captain Sisay
cards.text: {T}: Search your library for a legendary card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: "Each year that passes rings you inwardly with memory and might. Wield your heart, and the world will tremble."
cards.name: Doran, the Siege Tower
cards.text: Each creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

cards.name: Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker
cards.text:
Haste
{T}: Create a token that's a copy of target nonlegendary creature you control. That token has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: Each of his twenty-two braids is bound with bone and leather from a foe.
cards.name: Kresh the Bloodbraided
cards.text: Whenever another creature dies, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Kresh the Bloodbraided, where X is that creature's power.

cards.name: Mikaeus, the Lunarch
cards.text:
Mikaeus, the Lunarch enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mikaeus.
{T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mikaeus: Put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

cards.flavor: It gathers against the coming storm.
cards.name: Omnath, Locus of Mana
cards.text:
Green mana doesn't empty from your mana pool as steps and phases end.
Omnath, Locus of Mana gets +1/+1 for each green mana in your mana pool.

cards.name: Oona, Queen of the Fae
cards.text:
Flying
{X}{U/B}: Choose a color. Target opponent exiles the top X cards of his or her library. For each card of the chosen color exiled this way, create a 1/1 blue and black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

cards.flavor: The Soul of the World has returned.
cards.name: Progenitus
cards.text:
Protection from everything
If Progenitus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Progenitus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

cards.name: Rafiq of the Many
cards.text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gains double strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor: To gain audience with the hegemon, one must bring a riddle she has not heard.
cards.name: Sharuum the Hegemon
cards.text:
Flying
When Sharuum the Hegemon enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.flavor: "One score and four he reigned, the Southland king: / A dragon coiled, a tiger poised below the mighty Yangtze."
cards.name: Sun Quan, Lord of Wu
cards.text: Creatures you control have horsemanship. (They can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

cards.flavor: To save this plane, he must forsake all others.
cards.name: Teferi, Mage of Zhalfir
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield have flash.
Each opponent can cast spells only any time he or she could cast a sorcery.

cards.name: Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre
cards.text:
When you cast Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre, destroy target permanent.
Indestructible
Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.)
When Ulamog is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

cards.name: Visara the Dreadful
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
